' stone , now a member of the libertarian party , co-wrote his book with libertarian writer mike colapietro . ruby , whose real name was jacob leon rubenstein , moved from chicago to dallas in 1947 , the same year stone alleges that nixon put him on the house payroll at johnson 's request . ruby died of a pulmonary embolism on january 3 , 1967 , a little more than three years after killing oswald . johnson died of a massive heart attack on january 22 , 1973 . nixon died on april 22 , 1994 , after suffering a severe stroke four days earlier . ` behind closed doors ' : ` nixon knew jack ruby , hired him on house payroll in 1947 at request of ... lyndon johnson , ' stone wrote on his facebook page .
